abstract: Norwegian Air Shuttle, a budget airline, said it returned both new Boeing 787 jets to service over the past week.
snippet: Norwegian Air Shuttle, a budget airline, said it returned both new Boeing 787 jets to service over the past week.
lead_paragraph: PARIS — Norwegian Air Shuttle, a budget airline, confirmed Monday that it had briefly grounded both of its new Boeing 787 jets over the past week after the aircraft experienced technical problems.

headline.main: Airline in Norway Says It Briefly Grounded Dreamliners
